title: University Course Information
transcript: The Introduction to Psychology course runs for twelve weeks every Tuesday and Thursday from 2 to 4 PM in Room 201 of the Science Building. The course costs three hundred and fifty dollars, which includes all textbooks and materials. Students must attend at least ten out of the twelve sessions to receive a certificate. There will be two assignments during the course and one final exam. Registration closes next Friday, and classes begin the following Monday.

questions.question: On which days are the classes held?
The course is held in the Arts Building.

What must students do to receive a certificate?
Classes start on the same day registration closes.
